tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE brand_influencer_match (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT,
    influencer_id INT,
    audience_age_range TEXT,
    audience_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE influencers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    followers_count INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT,
    category VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    age_group VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE brands (
    brand_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    industry TEXT NOT NULL,
    location TEXT,
    audience_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE influencers (
    influencer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    email TEXT UNIQUE,
    followers INT,
    engagement_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
    audience_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    age_group TEXT,
    gender TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    interests TEXT[]
);
